name: Unstoppable
storyline:
'Unstoppable' is set in Manhattan, New York, during the 2000s.
It is an action survival game that follows the story of 'Mac Knight', a courier who becomes trapped in a building due to a mysterious accident while fulfilling a delivery request from a client offering a substantial fee.
summary:
Escape the Building: Survive the Infected!

Introducing “Unstoppable”, the adrenaline-pumping adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat. As an outbreak of a mysterious virus turns innocent people into infected, you must rely on your wits, quick thinking, and stealth to survive.
Every decision matters – one wrong move could mean your doom!
Explore dark corridors and evade the infected lurking in the shadows.
But beware, the infected are relentless and always on the hunt.
Will you outsmart them or succumb to their insatiable hunger?
